verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed be the Lord God, The God Israel. Blessed be the Lord God, The God of Israel. Who only doeth wondrous things, Who only doeth wondrous things; And blessed be His glorious Name forever. Let the whole earth be filled With His glory, amen. Amen, amen, amen.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed be the Lord God, The God of Israel. Blessed be the Lord God, The God of Israel. Amen, amen, amen.{/lang-eng}
